name: Мафия 1x1
description: Desktop mafia online in a new format 1 on 1. There is no communication in the game. You yourself play for the entire mafia team or the entire peaceful team. Among the 15 inhabitants of the house there are 5 killers, find them as civilians, or fool your enemy as the mafia. There are many roles in the game, from which you yourself can assemble a unique composition and come up with your own victory tactics. Compete with other players and increase the rating or play with friends.
